entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 6:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except east 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
